ch.unige.ng.problems.nklandscape
Class NKLandscapeFitness

java.lang.Object
  ch.unige.ng.problems.nklandscape.NKLandscapeFitness
All Implemented Interfaces:
Fitness<java.lang.Boolean>, Flushable
public class NKLandscapeFitness
extends java.lang.Object
implements Fitness<java.lang.Boolean>, Flushable

This fitness calculates the fitness of a NK-landscape problem. The problem works on: {0,1}**k -> {0,1} There is only one lookup table, of size 2**k. For each gene, we determine a k-1 neigbours to look at. To compute a gene, we get the index in the lookup table. The index is calculated like this: n[i] n[i*k+1] n[i*k+2] n[i*k+3]... The goal is to obtain a maximum of ones.

Version:
3 mai 2005
Author:
Jacques Fontignie
